712370.name: Fallen Sword II
712370.description:
A spiritual successor to the beloved retro browser MMORPG Fallen Sword, this new journey leads you once more across the storied lands of Erildath as you discover what it truly means to be a Hero. Battle new and classical beasts, collect powerful items, and delve into dungeons teeming with random encounters. Forge your own gear, brew magical potions, and test your mettle against other adventurers. Will you be the Hero who will bring peace forevermore to Erildath?

You have been Chosen. Like heroes before you, the Gods select their champion to fight back the darkness. To travel to the Withered Lands and seal Imaar back in their prison for another age. In your hands, you would wield the fabled Fallen Sword, but this time is different.

With the sword shattered, its fragments lost to the Sea of Souls, you are without its power, but the world has not given up yet. Within you stirs the great soul of a Hero. Fight the darkness, break the cycle, and save the world.

Battle formidable foes and duel fellow adventurers in fast-paced turn-based combat. Fling blazing fireballs, unleash raging blizzards, and wield elemental weapons to exploit enemy weaknesses. Cripple your foes with debilitating status effects, or shield and enhance yourself with powerful magic. Summon loyal entities—from cute to terrifying—to fight at your side. Continuously hone and customize your gear sets, empower yourself with potent potions, and level up to unlock new abilities for the challenges that await.

Venture into the perilous Gauntlets filled with unpredictable encounters, fearsome bosses, and exceptional loot. Brave mischievous dungeon traps that may aid or hinder your quest. Acquire powerful curios to refine your build as you approach the final dungeon boss.

Earn experience, collect items, and master powerful skills and spells through six heroic class pathways: Warrior, Mage, Rogue, Guardian, Cleric, and Ranger. Countless new classes and legendary artifacts await in future adventures.

Craft mighty weapons and armor, brew powerful potions with Alchemy, and enchant your gear with the Gemforge. Shape your builds and save your favourite gear sets to swiftly adapt your strength for any challenge ahead.

Create or join a Guild and defend Erildath from the threat of the world-ending Titans in epic, large-scale battles. Build structures to apply boons to your fellow guild members as they venture forth on their daily quests and adventures.

Immerse yourself in the world of Erildath with colourful characters, epic quests, and magical lands. Participate in events to challenge legendary foes and measure your prowess alongside fellow adventurers.
